articles.title: China has military presence in space, warns Nasa chief - India Today
articles.description: Nasa chief Bill Nelson told American lawmakers that China had a military presence in space The Nasa chief said China was using its civilian space programmes to mask the military ones He said China could assert its claim to the Moon039s resources

The chief of Nasa has flagged China's military presence in space and said Beijing was using its civilian space programmes to hide military objectives.
